During the International Charity for Purchase of the next Party of Strait Sich Rapitors for Sich Units, citizens of Russia were the most active.

About thisinformsMain Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

“Four days before the volunteer action conducted by Freedom, almost 3,000 people joined. Of these, 1538 Russians, including 200 Muscovites, who scanned the QR code from the screens of their TVs and gadgets, ”the department said.

GUR also noted some symbolism in the fact that the peak of Donates on drones for Ukrainian intelligence from citizens of the aggressor state coincided with the holding of the so-called "Putin elections". Instead of participating in the Kremlin Farsa, conscious Russians decided to vote in dollar and the euro for the sake of freedom of their country.

"This is the best investment in Russia's free future, which can only occur in the event of complete destruction and dismantling of the terrorist regime in the Kremlin," the scouts said.

The department added that Ukrainians, who are abroad, citizens of Latvia, Germany, Poland, Moldova and other states, were also joined by the International Sich International Sich Accumulators for Military Separates.

As reported by the Armyinform, tanks with a deserted tower: whyThe Russian "breakthrough" was a "poll".
title: During the Putin's Election, the Russians actively padded drones for our scouts
